DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at investigating the neuroplastic potential and the possible factors affecting rehabilitation in chronic schizophrenia patients on stable medication, by investigating the cumulative pattern of serum BDNF representing the neuroplasticity in the brain, through quantitative stimulus such as rTMS.
DOC.brief_title: rTMS-induced Cumulative Pattern of sBDNF in Chronic Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects who have been enrolled for this study will take baseline evaluation for sociodemographic data and serum level of BDNF, plasma Prolaction, and magnesium, etc. And then, weekday regular stimulation through rTMS will be applied on DLPFC of brain. After the completion of stimulation for 2 weeks, the change or response of serum BDNF will be analyzed and compared.
DOC.criteria: duration of illness over 10 years on stable medication, antipsychotics no change on medication within at least 2 weeks Diagnosis of Schizophrenia according to DSMIVTR left or bothhandedness anticonvulsant use lorazepam equivalent over 3 mg
